LanguageData.Leather_WoWDirewolf.label: 恐狼皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDirewolf.description: The strong furry leather of a dire wolf. Compared to most leather, it is quite a bit tougher and a bit better at all kinds of temperature regulation.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWRaptor.label: 迅猛龙皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWRaptor.description: The tanned skin of a cold-blooded reptile. Raptorskin is reasonably tough, but does not insulate well at all.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWHorse.label: 艾泽拉斯马皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWHorse.description: Tanned, dried, scraped horse skin. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWUnicorn.label: 独角兽皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWUnicorn.description: Tanned, dried, scraped unicorn skin. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWForsakenhorse.label: 骸骨军马皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWForsakenhorse.description: Tanned, dried, scraped forsaken horse skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightsaber.label: 夜刃豹皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightsaber.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from a nightsaber. It is difficult to pierce and insulates well against heat.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWHawkstrider.label: 陆行鸟皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWHawkstrider.description: Tanned, dried, scraped hawkstrider skin. It is quite delicate. Without its feathers, it provides little protection from heat or cold.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWKodo.label: 科多兽皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWKodo.description: The tanned skin of a cold-blooded reptile. Kodo-skin is reasonably tough, but does not insulate well at all.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDragonhawk.label: 龙鹰皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDragonhawk.description: The tanned skin of a cold-blooded reptile. Dragonhawk-skin is reasonably tough, but does not insulate well at all.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWMurloc.label: 鱼人皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWMurloc.description: The tanned skin of a amphibious creature. Murloc-skin isn't very tough, but insulates quite well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWRam.label: 卡兹莫丹山羊皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWRam.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from a ram. It is difficult to pierce and insulates well against heat.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWFairyDragon.label: 精灵龙皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWFairyDragon.description: The tanned skin of a cold-blooded reptile. Fairy dragon skin is reasonably tough, but does not insulate well at all.
